!http://www.reactiongifs.com/r/2013/04/escalated.gif!

My biggest critique would be some of the emboldened sound effects and motions.

Like sigh and twitch

Having something like "blag blah blah" she said, releasing a sigh. Or " I'll just have the", her nose twitched, "hayfries, please" would work better if you ask me.
